sentences.sContent: Its simplistic psychology is illustrated by the new cliche of the date-rape furor:" 'No' always means 'no'.
sentences.sContent_eng: Its simplistic psychology is illustrated by the new cliche of the date-rape furor:" 'No' always means 'no'.
sentences.sCn: 对于约会强奸的新版陈词滥调可以说明存在其中的简单心理特征：“‘不’总是意味着‘不’”。

synos.tran: 陈词滥调；[印刷]铅版；陈腐思想

trans.tranCn: 陈词滥调；[印刷] 铅版；陈腐思想
